function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Disproportionate impact on immigrants in declining industries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Immigrant participation gap in training and skills development","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher training needs for immigrants in occupations at risk of automation","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Disproportionate impact of pandemic on learning outcomes of children of immigrants","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Scant evidence on long-term effects such as school disengagement for children of immigrants","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Overrepresentation of students from socio-economically disadvantaged backgrounds","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Language barriers and difficulties of foreign-born parents in guiding children through host-country curricula","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data on educational attainment of children of immigrants during the crisis","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Disproportionately negative impact of pandemic on educational outcomes of children of immigrants","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreased immigration and emigration of previous immigrants","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Weak labor market attachment for refugees and family migrants","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decline in use of posted workers during the pandemic","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increase in labour market participation of immigrant men and women","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Initial increase in unemployment among refugees during the first lockdown in 2020","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Immigrant women working in hard-hit service sectors","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disproportionate burden on mothers with small children","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise in the participation of migrant women in the labor market","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Simultaneous increase in immigrant unemployment in multiple countries","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Higher participation rate of immigrants post-pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in the hospitality sector due to job losses among immigrants.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differential impact of job retention schemes on immigrant workers, leading to potential overrepresentation in certain sectors.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emigration of immigrants from certain european oecd countries","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large declines in employment for both immigrants and native-born individuals in colombia and chile","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Immigrants are more affected by economic downturns due to less stable employment conditions and generally lower seniority at work","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Immigrants are overrepresented in sectors most affected by the pandemic, such as hospitality and essential health professions","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Immigrant employment rates experienced a sharp decline in the early phase of the pandemic, with a disproportionately strong increase in 2021","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complexity in adding vaccinations administered abroad to registers","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Significant differences in vaccination rates between foreign-and native-born populations in various countries","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low vaccination rates among immigrant groups from specific geographic regions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Access issues and language barriers affecting vaccination uptake in migrant populations","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited data on covid-19 vaccination coverage by country of birth","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inequity in covid-19 vaccination coverage between native-born and foreign-born individuals","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher excess mortality linked to socio-demographic characteristics","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Communication barriers contributing to excess mortality","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overrepresentation of immigrants among inpatients in oecd countries due to covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher risk of critical care and icu admission for migrants due to covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased overrepresentation of immigrants among inpatients during the second wave of the pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Living in areas with higher population density","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher likelihood of immigrants to contract the covid-19 disease due to specific vulnerabilities.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Imposition of a 25% import tariff may disrupt global trade and supply chains, leading to economic instability and reduced access to essential risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of diversified supply chains leading to dependency on specific regions or countries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Specific assets and knowledge capital involved in supplier base","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Small open economies relying more on
